messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Administrative Post,  META,  and all that
messages.msgSnippet: Joyce, I think you are wonderful and your suggestions to resolve the mess here....I applaud your efforts and find you to alway be clear and thoughtful in your
messages.messageBody:
Joyce,
I think you are wonderful and your suggestions to resolve the mess here....I
applaud your efforts and find you to alway be clear and thoughtful in your
contributions. I do think the general guidelines are fine the way they are,
though I hope list members will take your advice and let's move past this.
The only messages here lately have been on this (business of the
list)....and I hope it enables us to move on.....but I'm aching for some
really mind opening discussion....and would like to move on to that.
I know there are other lists having them......my favorites are SO
cacophonous and have an abundance of prolific writers.....and I am not able
to keep up enough at this point to contribute there. I was hoping this list
I could keep up with and contribute to regularly.
I'm gonna throw some things out and see what happens.
Susan


> All your suggestions are appreciated Joyce.
>
> When Helen decided a while back to go to moderated status on this list,
she,
> Cindy, and I hashed out the detailes of list guidelines, which we post
> periodically. It was decided to be a very general guideline, because
> moderating and policing people is not something Helen is interested in for
> this list, nor do I suspect anyone is. These guidelines will not please
> everyone, but will hopefully encourage people to think a bit before
posting.
> Here are the guidelines.
>
> The following administrative message will be posted monthly or as
necessary:
>
> The primary purpose of this list is mutual support for unschooling, which
can
> mean different things to different people. Because there is no one right
> definition or approach, the expression and coexistence of diverse
viewpoints
> is encouraged and expected on this list. Posts which are primarily
> argumentative, defensive, and/or focused on past grievances will not be
> tolerated. Mary Broussard (<A
HREF="http://groups.yahoo.com/group/Unschooling-dotcom/post?protectID=034176
114056121028130218175024247208098145211">lite2yu@...</A>) and Cindy
Fergerson
> (<A
HREF="http://groups.yahoo.com/group/Unschooling-dotcom/post?protectID=219212
014237146132062082066077249241078152139218183041">crma@...</A>)
are co-moderators for this list. Feel free to contact
> either of them at any time for information or assistance.
>
>
>
>
>
